summary: This is an email from August 12, 2019, discussing a public statement regarding placing two staff members on administrative leave pending an investigation. The sender indicates agreement with 'MI' on not naming the staff and proposes specific wording for the statement.

events.title: Discussion of Public Statement on Staff Leave
events.description: An email exchange discusses the wording of a public statement regarding placing two staff members on administrative leave pending an investigation.

keyFacts: Two staff members were placed on administrative leave pending the outcome of an investigation as of August 12, 2019.
A decision was made between the email sender and 'MI' to not name the staff members in the public statement.
The proposed statement wording was: 'two staff have been placed on administrative leave pending the outcome of the investigation.'
